title: The Formula
occurrences: Then the formula for that catalyst would still be considered secret.
Whoever possessed the formula would need only coal...
They wanted the Genesis formula. The one that contained the final catalyst.
Dr. Esau, what happened to that final formula?
I'm going to inscribe for you the Genesis formula.
Promise me that you will make my formula public.
And it was then that the two of you took the formula to the British in Hamburg, right?
This is a copy of the Genesis formula. If anything should happen to me...
I mean, you've had the formula since '45. Why...? Why all the masquerade?
...in the development of the Genesis formula.
...we bought up the formula and Doctor...
...for phony research on a formula that already works.
You gave the formula to the Swiss.
